name: Baxton_Studio_Espresso_Shoe-Rack_Modern_Cabinet
reviews: Good for shoe storage but I also use it to store other items. Heavier than I though it would be, sturdy cabinet
This cabinet is beautiful and very sturdy. Even I could put it together. 😀Highly recommend

We bought two of these units to store or shoes in the garage. Or main driver to purchase wad that it had sliding doors so that shoes could be accessed even when the cars are payment inside, but be protected from dust.The units are particle board with wood - like veneer - you get what you pay for. For the cost, they look decent, assembled easily, clear picture instructions, all parts were present and decent quality.

We purchased this cabinet to clean up the shoes in our entryway, as we take off shoes at the door, Japan-style. The rack was easy to assemble and meets our needs. Importantly, it accommodates my size 11 men's shoes and the doors still close. It is certainly bigger than our previous solutions, but you're only going to get about 4 pair of men's shoes on a shelf, and that is with some angling. But, how many pair do I need to keep at the entrance, really. For us, there's a shelf for everyone and one for guests.
I got it for my fish tank. Easy to assemble and very sturdy!
I LOVE THE SHOE RACK AND IT'S EASY TO ASSEMBLE AND LOVE THE QUALITY!!
description: Organize your footwear collection in modern style with this Baxton Studio shoe rack cabinet. Boasting enough storage space for approximately 18 pairs of shoes, this cabinet lets you arrange each pair by color, season or style. The sliding door keeps your collection neatly out of sight while protecting each pair from dust, and the cabinet top offers additional space for displaying vase or storing a few favorite handbags.Contemporary shoe rack cabinet provides storage for up to 18 pairs of shoesFlat top surface offers additional storage or display spaceCrafted from engineered wood with espresso wood grain-effect paper for enhanced beautyFeatures four interior shelves, which provide convenient organization optionsOverall dimensions measure 45.1" H x 30.75" W x 15" DIndividual shelf dimensions measure 6.75" H x 29.2" W x 12.1" DStyleModernMaterialVeneerFinishBrown FinishShelf TypeHorizontalAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorBrownNumber of Shelf4
